messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: NBTHK AB book
messages.msgSnippet: Cheers mate, yes I have the Masamune book, it was not too bad the shipping, nice publication as well. I will look forward to this one. Rich ... -- *Richard
messages.messageBody:
Cheers mate, yes I have the Masamune book, it was not too bad the
shipping, nice publication as well. I will look forward to this one.

Rich

Jim Gilbert wrote:

> Rich,
> The book will be available by mail from the NBTHK AB. I'll post
> something when they're printed. I think that some of the Influence of
> Masamune books are still available, but there aren't any fittings
> published in that. They were $25 + $5 for shipping, but overseas
> postage would probably be more.
>
> Jim
>
>
>
> Jim, thanks for the info, back to the books for me :-)
>
> Having much interest in the NBTHK AB catalogue, how would I get my
> hands on one of these as I am not a member and will sadly miss another
> great ( actually 2 ) exhibition
>
> Cheers mate
>
> Rich
>
>

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: NBTHK AB book
messages.msgSnippet: Rich, The book will be available by mail from the NBTHK AB.  I ll post something when they re printed.  I think that some of the Influence of Masamune books
messages.messageBody:
Rich,
The book will be available by mail from the NBTHK AB. I'll post something when they're printed. I think that some of the Influence of Masamune books are still available, but there aren't any fittings published in that. They were $25 + $5 for shipping, but overseas postage would probably be more.

Jim



Jim, thanks for the info, back to the books for me :-)

Having much interest in the NBTHK AB catalogue, how would I get my
hands on one of these as I am not a member and will sadly miss another
great ( actually 2 ) exhibition

Cheers mate

Rich
